name: Cloud Bounce
description:
Join Squirt as he jumps and bounces in the sky through varying times of day, on his way to Cloud Land.

Features character and level animation, 60fps gameplay, and over 150 unique screens of platforming-- all in 280 characters!

Controls:

Left/Right---Move

Z------------Small jump/bounce

X------------Regular jump/bounce

Z+X----------Super jump/bounce

Reset Cart---Retry
